game.name: MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM BATTLE OPERATION 2
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards
game.shortDescription: This is a free-to-play team battle action game based on the "Mobile Suit Gundam" series of the Universal Century. Whether by land or by space, lay waste to your foes using either your favorite Mobile Suit or roam the battlefield as infantry and capture important objectives.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a free-to-play team battle action game based on the "Mobile Suit Gundam" series of the Universal Century. Whether by land or by space, lay waste to your foes using either your favorite Mobile Suit or roam the battlefield as infantry and capture important objectives.
